content.query:
-- Create FactWeather table with matching data types

CREATE TABLE FactWeather(
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rain_1h REAL,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    date DATE,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    weather_id_value integer,
    weather_mail_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_icon_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_combined_value NVARCHAR(200)
)

-- Insert data into FactWeather
INSERT INTO FactWeather
SELECT
    clouds_all,
    feels_like_K,
    humidity,
    pressure,
    temp_K,
    temp_max_K,
    temp_min_K,
    wind_deg,
    wind_gust,
    wind_speed,
    rain_1h,
    corrected_timestamp,
    location,
    date_time,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    id,
    temp_C,
    temp_min_C,
    temp_max_C,
    feels_like_C,
    temp_F,
    temp_min_F,
    temp_max_F,
    feels_like_F,
    lat,
    lon,
    weather_id_value,
    weather_mail_value,
    weather_description_value,
    weather_icon_value,
    weather_combined_value,
    CONCAT(weather_id_value, '_', weather_icon_value) AS weather_combined_value
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO
